title: raftstore.raft-max-inflight-msgs can not support query through show config
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v5.1.1

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
centos
4 cores
8m memery

### Steps to reproduce
MySQL [(none)]> show config where name = 'raftstore.raft-max-inflight-msgs';
Empty set (0.01 sec)

the same issue from asktug
https://asktug.com/t/topic/122842

### What did you expect?
raftstore.raft-max-inflight-msgs can be query through show config

### What did happened?
raftstore.raft-max-inflight-msgs can not support query through show config
